name: NLTagger.Options
desc: Constants for linguistic tagger enumeration specifying which tokens to omit and whether to join names.

items.name: static var omitWords: NLTagger.Options
items.desc: Omit tokens of type word (items considered to be words).

items.name: static var omitPunctuation: NLTagger.Options
items.desc: Omit tokens of type punctuation (all punctuation).

items.name: static var omitWhitespace: NLTagger.Options
items.desc: Omit tokens of type whitespace (whitespace of all sorts).

items.name: static var omitOther: NLTagger.Options
items.desc: Omit tokens of type other (non-linguistic items, such as symbols).

items.name: static var joinNames: NLTagger.Options
items.desc: Typically, multiple-word names will be returned as multiple tokens, following the standard tokenization practice of the tagger.

items.name: static var joinContractions: NLTagger.Options
items.desc: Contractions will be returned as one token.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates the option with a raw value.
